about_the_game:
Here is some features about this game and the concept!

Overview:
Welcome to "The Last Customer," a gripping survival horror experience set in an isolated gas station. As Mike, the dedicated clerk, you and your missing friend John face nightmarish beings disguised as customers. Your mission: identify who’s there for gas and who has deadly intentions.

Story:
The gas station, once a safe haven, is now haunted by grotesque monsters. With John mysteriously absent, Mike must navigate a chilling night filled with deceit. As reality blurs with nightmare, will he find John and survive, or become the next victim?

Gameplay Features:

  • Interactive Storytelling: Your choices shape the narrative and influence outcomes.

  • Identify the Threat: Use your instincts to distinguish between harmless customers and deadly monsters.

  • Atmospheric Horror: Experience a tense environment filled with dark corners and chilling visuals.

  • Multiple Endings: Your decisions lead to various outcomes—will you escape or succumb to the terror?

  • Real-Time Decision Making: Quick judgments are crucial for survival.

  • Dynamic AI: Monsters adapt, keeping you on edge.

  • Psychological Horror: Fear that challenges your sanity with subtle cues and unexpected moments.

  • You Can Play It On A CRT: Its Aspect ratio is 4:3/1.33 

In "The Last Customer," trust no one and fear everyone. Can you survive the night and uncover the truth? Step into Mike’s shoes and prepare for relentless suspense and terror.

short_description: The Last Customer is a survival horror game where you play as a gas station clerk facing nightmarish creatures disguised as customers. Make quick decisions, manage resources, and uncover dark secrets to survive. Test your instincts and unravel the mystery before it's too late.
